attributes.action: ignore the petition to Safeguard the British public's right to purchase and use LPG fired patio heaters.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gas fired 'patio heaters' burn a fossil fuel which releases heat and carbon dioxide directly into the atmosphere. This is an incredible waste of a rapidly diminishing finite resource. Heating should be allowed in enclosed spaces and ideally only in insulated closed spaces.

The UK is a temperate country which means it is has a cold season. People do not have the right to all year outside heat.

This product may well be routinely burnt as a waste by-product in oil refineries but that is a seperate issue that should be addressed seperately.

rejection.details: We do not accept petitions on petitions.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
